channel.title: Ok need help with something on my client =]
channel.description: I have been working on my own client and i wanna hide the ip section of it cos i have it set to my ip as defualt ip but how do i do that? im havin a bit of a prob doin it lol dunno what to change in the code to make it hide the option to type in an ip so can anyone help me hide the ip selecting option and the port selecting option?
